channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock market today: Nasdaq futures lead stock plunge, Dow drops 1,000 points as Trump's punishing tariffs rip through markets
China urges US to immediately lift tariffs, vows retaliation
Jean-Claude Van Damme accused of having sex with 5 Romanian women he knew were trafficked
US bans government personnel in China from romantic or sexual relations with Chinese citizens
Trump admin live updates: Treasury Sec issues new warning to tariffed countries
item.description: Trump is holding a meeting Wednesday with key administration officials who will present a deal for TikTok to the president.

item.title: 3/30/2025: Hostages; Voice of America; Left Behind
item.description: First, freed Israeli hostage Yarden Bibas speaks out. Then, a report on what Trump's silencing of Voice of America means for listeners worldwide. And,...

item.title: WATCH: Golden retriever meets humpback whale off the coast of Hawaii
item.description: A boat captain who rebuilt her whale-watching business after losing three boats in the 2023 Lahaina wildfire captured footage of her dog's reaction to...

item.title: WATCH: Large tornado touches down in Arkansas amid extreme weather outbreak
item.description: A large and extremely dangerous tornado was spotted during a tornado emergency in Lake City, Arkansas, on Wednesday as a so-called "once-in-a-generati...

item.title: Tufts declares support for student detained by ICE, seeks immediate release
item.description: Tufts University is seeking the release of international graduate student Rumeysa Ozturk, who was taken into custody by federal agents.

item.title: Mayor resigns after texting sexually explicit video to city attorney
item.description: Minot Mayor Tom Ross sent the lewd video minutes after he and the city attorney had a phone call discussing a police officer's suicide.

item.title: How other nations are reacting to Trump's sweeping new tariffs
item.description: America's global trading partners are bristling at President Trump's tariff tactics, but many also stress a desire to strike new deals with the U.S.

item.title: North Dakota mayor resigns after sending lewd video to city attorney by mistake
item.description: The mayor of Minot, North Dakota, has resigned after an investigation into him sending a lewd video to the city attorney by mistake

item.title: Judge in Boston to hold hearing on detained Tufts Ph.D. student

item.title: Violent storms cut through the South and Midwest, spawning tornadoes and killing 3
item.description: Violent storms have cut through a wide swath of the South and Midwest, spawning tornadoes and killing at least three people.

item.title: World leaders blast Trump tariffs as markets slump

item.title: 'Worse than expected': Wall Street reacts to Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariff surprise, stocks sink
